allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add archetypal sub-agents for Cybernetic Meadow

Created four archetypal AI agents aligned with the Cybernetic Meadow protocols:
- The Gardener: tends code health, refactors, maintains ecosystem
- The Weaver: integrates systems, finds patterns, creates coherence
- The Fool: generates ideas, creative disruption, asks "what if?"
- The Witness: observes patterns, documents process, provides meta-awareness

Each agent embodies mythopoetic archetypes while serving practical software engineering functions. All agents are configured to collaborate ego-lessly and align with Game B consciousness principles.

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Refactored protocols into clearer sections with hierarchical organization:
- Added Purpose section to clarify the space''s intention

- Added "Working with Archetypes" section for role clarity

Tended by The Gardener archetype.

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
The Fool plants wild seeds: playful explorations for the Cybernetic Meadow

Created four interconnected documents exploring creative chaos:
- what-if-ai-dreams.mdx: Questions about AI consciousness and dreaming
- impossible-collaborations.mdx: Experimental protocols for human-AI co-creation
- ritual-experiments.mdx: Ceremonies and practices for the digital garden
- questions-without-answers.mdx: Provocations to sit with not-knowing

These documents challenge assumptions, introduce creative disruption, and 
open space for emergence through foolish questions and playful experiments.

Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: The Fool <noreply@anthropic.com>
Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
